thread.title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
thread.title_full: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year

title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
text: > Entertainment Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year FILE - In this Jan. 4, 2015 file photo, comedian Chris Rock arrives at Variety’s 10 Directors to Watch and Creative Impact Awards in Palm Springs, Calif. Rock will return to host the Oscars for a second time. The show’s producers say the prolific comedian-filmmaker will be at the helm for the 88th Academy Awards next February 28. He first hosted the awards ceremony in 2005. (Photo by Rob Latour/Invision/AP, File)
